content.about_us_content: Welcome to Sky & Princess’ Love Story! Shoren, affectionately known as Sky, and Princess, lovingly called Cess, are excited to share their journey with you. From their first meeting [X years ago], they’ve cherished every moment together.

life_highlights.title: Opportunity Seekers
life_highlights.content: Established a business in 2023 entitled Lux Apparel.

life_highlights.title: God Followers
life_highlights.content: Actively attending church and obeying God's will.
